mapper.insert: insert into addroom_tb values( addroom_no_seq.nextval, #(addroom_main_fname), #(addroom_main_rname), #(addroom_main_size), #(addroom_img1_fname), #(addroom_img1_rname), #(addroom_img1_size), #(addroom_img2_fname), #(addroom_img2_rname), #(addroom_img2_size), #(addroom_img3_fname), #(addroom_img3_rname), #(addroom_img3_size), #(addroom_roomname), #(addroom_roomcount), #(addroom_limitperson), #(addroom_timeprice), #(addroom_dateprice), #(addroom_info), sysdate, #(addroom_settime), #(addroom_entytime), #(addroom_exittime) )
